text: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ

translation.en: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you
translation.id: Ketika mereka masuk ke tempatnya, lalu mereka mengucapkan, "Salām." Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, "kami benar-benar merasa takut kepadamu
